name: jamers
text: A comment left by jamers was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, atom, EM2, Orskasm, ravindra108)

name: behka
text: yes. it's almost as if the dog is saying, 'is this good enough, mr bear?  is it?'

name: howard
text: I thought he was saying awrrr?

name: joeyramoney
text: he's saying "awrrr".

name: jamers
text: Ooops! Several months later, I realize it is indeed, awrr? Ah well.

name: bazookaradio
text: Cornelius has a storied past. Cornelius is IT man.

name: nabeel84
text: A comment left by nabeel84 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Ariamaki, TonyHighwind, ravindra108, wingspan)

name: fermatprime
text: What's bullshit is that Lyle got it right. He'd rather push a Chevy than drive a Ford, after all.

name: tonyhighwind
text: You are a man more concerned with the wrapping than the present.

name: dusty
text: If you want a car that will take over your life yeah that's good. But this is a badass car, not a car to compensate because you aren't a badass.

name: delzhand
text:
Panel 5 - all other characters show looks of dismay, and the lines near their heads indicate a startled movement.

Except Cornelius.

name: liquidcruelty
text: He keeps it tall and frosty

name: the_doz
text:
TEODOR:kill...LYLE:kill...VLAD:kill...pat:(kill, presumably)...

CORNELIUS: serve coffee

name: epicurus
text: Does anyone have a theory about Pat's name being the only one in lowercase? Maybe because he was that much more cowardly?

name: the_doz
text: I think that's probably accurate. He squealed like a girl, and has proven himself unworthy of masculine capital letters.

name: cracker
text: His name was added to the database at a different time. The original list of participants did not include the name "pat".

name: terribleman
text: In my native language "pat" (as a noun) means tit.

name: terribleman
text:
I don't think it says pat:kill. This might very well be Pat's Magreaux dog, here because he's going gay. It is not fatal, so it isn't trying to stand or anything, but it is acting like a total dick just like Pat.
I think it says:

pat:present intactness. coy howling.

name: spinynorman
text:
His hands rest in his apron pockets.

He knows they will not be needed.

name: mxh
text: In that moment they have all already lost

name: agika
text: Cornelius is SO badass.

name: catachresis
text: Choosing C is so out of character for Mr. Bear. He would have gone with the Bugatti. I assume he was making an astute tactical decision, playing by the rules but also playing the rules.

name: pyro_ike
text: Any badass knows that you DO NOT drive a car that carries the words "L'Oreal" and "Awareness" in its title, no matter how awesome it would normally be.  IT IS NOT DONE.

name: tellumo
text: Definitely. And Cornelius would know that the Eliminator would be only two afternoons' work away from being the sort of car in which one could bounce together in the rumble seat with a favored member of an appropriate sex, and another afternoon's from being the sort of car in which one could casually flip off the police, of whom Cornelius knows no fear .

name: rolotonybrowntown
text: I just noticed that cornelius is wearing his official badass games wife beater OVER his regular clothes. Awesome.

name: mastronaut
text: I thought it was his apron all along, but upon further inspection that is indeed a wifre beater.

name: spinynorman
text:
I believe it has pockets in the fifth panel.

Or maybe he has tiny breadroll hands.

name: stereo
text: It appears they were told to arrive wearing sleeveless shirts - or maybe Pat just came late and was unable to obtain a real wife beater.

name: twotonturkey
text: The dog is called Magnus Intactus because he still has his sack.

name: whuppins
text: And what a sack it is!

name: chaesar
text: Yeah dang unless it is a really hot day that thing has got some gravity on it.

name: senseihollywood
text: A comment left by senseihollywood was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Cyberbob, _cheesekayke, Zem, cailetshadow)

name: stuart
text: Biggus Dickus?

name: luckypyjamas
text: Broadicus Dickus

name: woodenteeth
text: Incontinentia...

name: caseyb3
text: Magnus was the baddest pit bull in the yard. He wasn't clipped, so he looked like a brown watermelon with nuts. Did the chick dog want him? Yeah, they wanted him. But he had some men to judge. Fancy-ass men from the suburbs. Magnus paused; he turned a little and looked at his nuts in the mirror. "Now that's what I'M talkin 'bout," he said.

name: caseyb3
text: What better to symbolize Father's Day than a needed plural nowhere to be found

name: wiliamthepleasr
text:
Incontinentia Buttocks.

TWO YEARS someone left that joke hangin'? People, please.

name: woodenteeth
text: ohthankfuck... I thought I was going to explode with anticipation. No wonder they call you the pleasr .

name: philosophe
text: He does have [b]wicked sack[/b[

name: philosophe
text: wicked sack!!!

name: envika
text: "intact" is sometimes used as a euphemisn for "uncircumcised," but have it your way i guess...

name: mangtastic
text:
Why would they circumcise a dog?
Is that even possible ?

name: terribleman
text: This is something I choose not to investigate further into. Nothing good will come of it.

name: terribleman
text: The fact that he still has his boys makes him intact, even though he's missing his LEFT HIND LEG!

name: havenless
text: Pats reaction to Magnus freaking kills me.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: you can see a tear pour out of his eye, there.

name: cousinted
text: It's like he's collapsing in on himself

name: zem
text: pat's not afraid of magnus, he respects him

name: jandruff
text: Man, Pat becomes a contortionist when he's terrified

name: luckypyjamas
text: i believe he's taking the liberty of reminding us all of pat's muscles witht that pose

name: dovey
text: That is mega nasty.

name: luckypyjamas
text: that is dog shit

name: closefriend
text: I love that Achewood is all about talking cats and stuffed animals, yet dogs are still portrayed as being creatures of low mind. So true.

name: goatmasterflash
text: There is nothing low mind about being a chump-detector/coffee machine. Magnus is an adept and noble  multi-tasker.

name: biddlebubbly
text:
I am amazed that nobody has questioned where roast beef got his cup of coffee.

Hint: probably by being a badass.

name: connellingus
text: Beef probably went to Starbucks to buy a coffee for the dog to offer to the true badass (you can see it outside of his cage in panel four) and picked himself up a "plain cuppa joe I guess black and no fuss please" while he was there.

name: woodenteeth
text: I only noticed the coffee outside the dog's cage today. 1 year after you did. This says something about the differences between you and I.

name: gompo
text: He's drinking it so angrily you can see the movement lines as he jerks it and crushes the cup to spray hot burning coffee into his throat, causing a terrible burn, but he's too much of a badass to cry so he just squints.

name: riazm
text: Come on guys, this one is hardly fair, a bunch of cats vs a dog?

name: anitrophaeron
text: I know, my cat is 14 and tiny and she kicks the shit out of our 4 year old husky on a weekly basis.

name: yossarianlives
text: Pat's melty pose makes it

name: henrythecad
text: Panel 8 is the best portrayal of pure terror i have ever seen.

name: dasilodavi
text: Panel 9; you can gussy it up all you like, but that my friends is a derivative POST-IT note!  And the name Pat isn't even in the right font.  Son of a bitch!

name: sonicbiology
text: Can any one else think of another all-text panel?

name: sonicbiology
text: Found one myself.

name: jyri00555
text: Pat's name is written differently because he is a dick.

name: meowmix
text: I gave this strip a 5 for Pat's reaction alone. He really is afraid of animals. Which is kinda ironic since he's a talking cat.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: Zine volume 2
Molly: The Achewood A-List! June 19, 2006

name: dasuta
text: Pat the amazing crumpling cat.

name: dino_grill
text:
all intact dogs have espresso machines in the their little cages.
fact.

name: keir
text: "Awrr?"  - That's genius. That sums a dog up.

name: josearcadio
text: woah pat looks freaky

name: nicolae
text: Damn, son, look at the church bells on Magnus! It would take more than a sudden breeze to set those things a-swingin'.

name: fakedaisies
text: I'm sure it's been mentioned and I just didn't notice, but Cornelius' wife-beater-over-suit-and-tie combo is pretty great.

name: greenkoolayd
text: actually, dear lady, 'tis an apron...

name: greenkoolayd
text: i take that back.  go ahead and shoot me in the face.

name: duperando
text:
"awrr?"
So cute.

name: dusty
text: There's a definite Dwightishness to the goofy serious tone of the ninth panel.

name: wiliamthepleasr
text: In panel five I love how everyone has itty bitty motion lines and/or a horrified expression about the canine.
